title: BAJA LOCO: 4 Racing Days & Tequila Nights on the NORRA Mexican 1000
description: "The journey is the destination." - Dan Eldon  "In order to write about life, first you must live it." - Ernest Hemingway  "A Rough Day can be fixed with One Thing - TEQUILA!" - Rico Austin  "Live as if you were to die tomorrow." - Mahatma Gandhi  "If you have everything under control, you're not moving fast enough." - Mario Andretti  "You'll see the true reflection of me when the tequila bottle is empty." - Rico Austin
author: Rico Austin
